conversation_summary: Enduring hot-white Lorne living-room; four shapeshifting DVDs on sun-bleached table. Upstairs corridor elongates like filmstrip. Laughing naked gunman, skin lacquered with sweat; single BB becomes silver key. Layered screens—four-sided window, key-shaped portal—loop twin tropical creeks across peeling walls. Father’s unseen hand curates the reels; motifs of harmless chase, disarmament, nested vision repeat every cycle.
